mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC

SELECT B.BOARD_TYPE, B.BOARD_NUM, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_COMMENT, B.CREATOR, B.CREATE_TIME, B.MODIFIER, B.MODIFIED_TIME, CASE WHEN U.DELETED_USER = 'Y' THEN '탈퇴한 회원' ELSE U.USER_ID END AS writer FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN USER_INFO U ON B.CREATOR = U.USER_ID WHERE B.BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} ORDER BY B.BOARD_NUM DESC

SELECT B.BOARD_TYPE, B.BOARD_NUM, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_COMMENT, B.CREATOR, B.CREATE_TIME, B.MODIFIER, B.MODIFIED_TIME, CASE WHEN U.DELETED_USER = 'Y' THEN '탈퇴한 회원' ELSE U.USER_ID END AS writer FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN USER_INFO U ON B.CREATOR = U.USER_ID WHERE B.BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_COMMENT, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFIED_TIME ) VALUES ( #{boardType}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardComment}, #{creator}, SYSDATE, #{modifier}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType}, BOARD_TITLE = #{boardTitle}, BOARD_COMMENT = #{boardComment}, MODIFIER = #{modifier}, MODIFIED_TIME = SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}
mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_TYPE, B.BOARD_NUM, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_COMMENT, B.CREATOR, B.CREATE_TIME FROM BOARD B JOIN USER_INFO M ON B.CREATOR = M.USER_ID WHERE M.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY B.CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT B.BOARD_TYPE, B.BOARD_NUM, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_COMMENT, B.CREATOR, B.CREATE_TIME, B.MODIFIER, B.MODIFIED_TIME, CASE WHEN U.DELETED_USER = 'Y' THEN '탈퇴한 회원' ELSE U.USER_ID END AS writer FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN USER_INFO U ON B.CREATOR = U.USER_ID WHERE B.BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} ORDER BY B.BOARD_NUM DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
SELECT BOARD_NUM, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_COMMENT, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, BOARD_TYPE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}
